snippet.title: Nintendo Switch™ Japanese Rail Sim: Hakone - Town of Natural Beauty and Hot Springs  - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
【 Official Site 】
https://www.sonicpowered.co.jp/train/ex/nsw-hakone/en/

【 Facebook 】
https://www.facebook.com/people/Japanese-Rail-Sim/61565450246495/

【 My Nintendo Store US 】
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/japanese-rail-sim-hakone-town-of-natural-beauty-and-hot-springs-switch/

【 My Nintendo Store UK 】
https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Japanese-Rail-Sim-Hakone-Town-of-Natural-Beauty-and-Hot-Springs-2643937.html

【Other Regions】
https://www.nintendo.com/region-selector/


We are currently recruiting operators for sightseeing trains in Hakone!

Come see the cherry blossoms and autumn leaves in beautiful Hakone, Japan!
Operate on one of Japan's most famous mountain railways and experience
the feeling of operating a Japanese train! 

---------------------------------------------------------
Title 　　　         Japanese Rail Sim: 
　　　　　　　  Hakone - Town of Natural Beauty and Hot Springs 
Release  Date　 Sep-19-2024
Platform    　 　 Nintendo Switch / Nintendo Switch Lite 
　　　　　　　  / Nintendo Switch - OLED Model
Genre       　　　Train Operating Simulation
Players 　　       1 
Languages　　  English / Japanese / Simplified Chinese
Retail Price 　    $49.99（Package / Download）
Publisher　　    Sonic Powered Co.,Ltd.

---------------------------------------------------------
In cooperation with Odakyu Hakone Co.,Ltd.

#nintendoswitch #nintendogames #simulation #games #train #railway #railfans
#japan #tokyo #hakone #mtfuji #japantravel #trip #traintravel #trainjourney #tjourney #sightseeing

© 2024 Sonic Powered Co.,Ltd.
